thread.title: USD/KRW Opens Higher, Steadies Before Data
thread.title_full: USD/KRW Opens Higher, Steadies Before China GDP Data - WSJ

author: Ewen Chew
title: USD/KRW Opens Higher, Steadies Before Data
text: 0022 GMT [Dow Jones] USD/KRW opened Monday at 1,131.0 versus its Friday close of 1,129.1 implying a mild depreciation of the South Korea won versus the U.S. dollar. The rise of the greenback was partly attributed to the much-better-than-expected U.S. consumer sentiment survey by the University of Michigan. USD/KRW is now hovering around 1,132.0, awaiting the next data catalyst for Asian currencies - the release of Chinaâ€™s 3Q gross domestic product data. Expectations are for the economy to have expanded 6.8% versus the 7.0% seen in the previous quarter. If the data disappoints, risk appetite may be affected and...
